String type in C#

Let's learn how to store strings in C#. Strings are one of the most used elements in programming. Of couse we're not talking about the ones in the above picture. (What a joke !)


String data type is used to store text sequences.


It's pretty easy and straightforward to define a string variable in C#. Just use double qoutes.
